title: Bird

properties.name: description
properties.value: Birds are avian enemies found on Ape Atoll, Crash Island, inside the Nature Altar, and throughout the Isle of Souls. They attack with melee and can be assigned as Slayer assignments by Turael. Although they are airborne, they use melee.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Bird
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page
This article is about the monster. For other avian creatures, see Bird (disambiguation).

Birds are avian enemies found on Ape Atoll, Crash Island, inside the Nature Altar, and throughout the Isle of Souls. They attack with melee and can be assigned as Slayer assignments by Turael. Although they are airborne, they use melee.

The ones in the Nature Altar are blocked off and can not be killed.

For the birds slayer task, you can instead kill other birds such as chickens.

  • 2 Drops
  • 3 Habitats
